argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dvafmul.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | dvafmul.t | |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | dvafmul.e | |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | dvafmul.u | |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) |
| 5 |  | dvafmul.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 6 |  | dvafmul.p | |- .x. = ( .r ` F ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) |
| 8 | 1, 7, 4, 5 | #P_dvasca | |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> F = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> ( .r ` F ) = ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .x. = ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 7, 11 | #P_erngfmul | |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( s o. t ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .x. = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( s o. t ) ) ) |
